core.dbmanager.h2dbManager

Interface DataSensorManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DataSensorManagerImpl

    public interface DataSensorManager
    Maps the RESTful API's functionality related to the management of sensors and sensor data in Java interface.
    Author:
    Giulia Lucchi

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getSensorsType

        org.json.JSONArray getSensorsType(java.lang.String idPatient)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns the list of sensor's types.
        Parameters:
        idPatient - patient's identifier
        Returns:
        JSONArray of sensor types' string otherwise a JSONObject including the error code
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - json containing error code

      • addNewSensorType

        boolean addNewSensorType(java.lang.String idPatient,
                         SensorType sensorType)
        Adds a sensor type related to a particular patient.
        Parameters:
        idPatient - patient's identifier
        sensorType - sensor type added
        Returns:
        boolean true if the request was successful false otherwise

      • addSensorValue

        boolean addSensorValue(java.lang.String idPatient,
                       SensorType sensorType,
                       java.lang.String message)
        Adds a value of a particular sensor type.
        Parameters:
        idPatient - patient's identifier
        sensorType - sensor type related to a value
        message - sensor type's value to add
        Returns:
        boolean true if the request was successful false otherwise

      • deleteValues

        boolean deleteValues(java.lang.String idPatient,
                     SensorType sensorType,
                     java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> start,
                     java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> end)
        Delete a particular value or a values' set on a particular range of date.
        Parameters:
        idPatient - patient's identifier
        sensorType - sensor type related to a value or values' set
        start - an optional start date to search on the range of date
        end - an optional end date to search on the range of date
        Returns:
        boolean true if the request was successful false otherwise

      • getSensorValues

        org.json.JSONArray getSensorValues(java.lang.String idPatient,
                                   SensorType sensorType,
                                   java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> start,
                                   java.util.Optional<java.lang.String> end)
                            throws org.json.JSONException,
                                   java.lang.Exception
        Returns a particular value or a values' set on a particular range of date.
        Parameters:
        idPatient - patient's identifier
        sensorType - sensor type related to a value or values' set
        start - an optional start date to search on the range of date
        end - an optional end date to search on the range of date
        Returns:
        JSONArray of a value or an values' set, represented by JSONObject
        Throws:
        org.json.JSONException
        java.lang.Exception
